name: The Fire - Demo
description:
THE FIRE

The fire is a difficult platforming game where the world grows around you.  You collect glowing rocks and attempt to not fall while travelling through relaxing low poly terrain.

SYSTEMS

The fire is available on Windows, Mac, and linux.

WHY A DEMO?

The fire will be coming out on steam as a full game, this is just the first little bit of the game.  If you are interested make sure to follow the game and follow me on twitter at https://twitter.com/DaegonStam

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow keys to move, space to jump.
